title: Thursday's High School Football Scores & Highlights
text:
Thursday's High School Football Scores & Highlights Posted: Updated: Malik Johnson scored three touchdowns in the first quarter for Blue Ridge Madison County's Isiah Smith returned a punt and a fumble for a TD in the first half against Riverside CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va (WVIR) - 
Blue Ridge 47, Covenant 0St. Anne's-Belfield 41, Nansemond Suffolk 24Clarke County 39, William Monroe 18Madison County 47, Riverside 6Riverheads 21, Buffalo Gap 14Harrisonburg 29, Waynesboro 25Luray 7, Wilson Memorial 6Stuarts Draft 47, Stonewall Jackson 0Altavista 34, Nelson County 0R.E. Full Story High School football scores and highlights from across Central Virginia on Thursday, October 1st. Full Story Thursday, October 1 2015 4:47 PM EDT 2015-10-01 20:47:18 GMT UVa is looking for its first NCAA Tournament appearance since 1999 The UVa volleyball team will take on Pittsburgh and Virginia Tech in its first conference matches at Memorial Gymnasium this season. Full Story The UVa volleyball team will take on Pittsburgh and Virginia Tech in its first conference matches at Memorial Gymnasium this season. Full Story Thursday, October 1 2015 4:23 PM EDT 2015-10-01 20:23:31 GMT The Monticello at Charlottesville football game has been moved to Monday at CHS Forecasted severe weather is forcing high school football teams in Central Virginia to reschedule their games for Monday. Full Story Forecasted severe weather is forcing high school football teams in Central Virginia to reschedule their games for Monday. Full Story Thursday, October 1 2015 10:57 AM EDT 2015-10-01 14:57:57 GMT Tom Sox head coach Travis Thomas Thomas served as the pitching coach for the Tom Sox in their inaugural season, and guided the team to the second-best ERA in the Valley Baseball League. Full Story Thomas served as the pitching coach for the Tom Sox in their inaugural season, and guided the team to the second-best ERA in the Valley Baseball League. Full Story Updated: Wednesday, September 30 2015 9:23 PM EDT 2015-10-01 01:23:51 GMT Aaron Stinnie was recruited to play defensive line at James Madison but after the 2014 season, coach Withers saw an opportunity for Stinnie at left tackle. Full Story Aaron Stinnie was recruited to play defensive line at James Madison but after the 2014 season, coach Withers saw an opportunity for Stinnie at left tackle. Full Story Updated: Wednesday, September 30 2015 9:11 PM EDT 2015-10-01 01:11:20 GMT A handful of local high school football games originally scheduled for Friday night have been rescheduled because of heavy rain in the forecast for Friday. Full Story A handful of local high school football games originally scheduled for Friday night have been rescheduled because of heavy rain in the forecast for Friday. Full Story Wednesday, September 30 2015 7:36 PM EDT 2015-09-30 23:36:14 GMT Mark Grooms scored a touchdown for Fluvanna The Flucos have suffered two losses this season by just one point, and will be looking for their first win under Steve Szarmach against Louisa County. Full Story The Flucos have suffered two losses this season by just one point, and will be looking for their first win under Steve Szarmach against Louisa County. Full Story Wednesday, September 30 2015 12:20 PM EDT 2015-09-30 16:20:20 GMT Kendall Fuller was named Virginia Tech starting cornerback Kendall Fuller will miss the rest of the season after undergoing knee surgery on his right knee. Fuller initially tore the meniscus in his knee during preseason training camp and tried to play through it. Full Story Virginia Tech starting cornerback Kendall Fuller will miss the rest of the season after undergoing knee surgery on his right knee. Fuller initially tore the meniscus in his knee during preseason training camp and tried to play through it. Full Story Updated: Tuesday, September 29 2015 9:33 PM EDT 2015-09-30 01:33:05 GMT The Albemarle HS volleyball team improved to 15-1 and 5-0 in the Jefferson District Tuesday night with a 3-0 win over Monticello. The game scores were 25-22, 25-19 and 25-7. Full Story The Albemarle HS volleyball team improved to 15-1 and 5-0 in the Jefferson District Tuesday night with a 3-0 win over Monticello.
